> <OLD>
>
> nightlight ran following Stampy

STAMPY and SHARPEDGE's run turned into an all out sprint as they ran
down tunnels and down stairs and through a shoot. Behind them they
could hear the sounds of others, presumably SHARKTICONS as they
rallied behind them and then came after them.

and then . . .

>>KRACKTHOOM!!<<


                               . . . the very ground was rocked!

"Keep running!" STAMPY said as they rounded anouther turn, and then
skidded to a stop.

And then there were several laser blasts thta lit up the room! One
sent STAMPY flying into a wall, the other sent SHARPEDGE flipping
through the air to land on the ground.

That is when the ebony hued version of RODIMUS walked up, his optics
glowing a deep purple, his large rifle in his hand, smoke beginning to
rise from its muzzle.

"What have you done Nightlight?" He said angrilly as he glanced over
at the fallen forms of STAMPY and SHARPEDGE, neither of whom moved or
showed any signs of life.

A look of anger and then sadness moving over his face. "Come!" He said
imperiously as three SHARKTICONS walked up as well and moved to pick
her up and force her to follow DARK RODIMUS.

"I don't know if I can save from this." He said darkly. He shook his
head, "I don't know if I want to." He sounded almost hurt.

Meanwhile other SHARKTICONS came and picked up the still unmoving
frames of SHARPEDGE and STAMPY.

(TAG)

- Preston
